OrgName.entry: WISEWOOD AND DISTRICT TENANTS AND RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION

Desc.entry: Helps with housing issues and organises some social activities. Resources include a meeting room, photocopying facilities and refreshment facilities for members.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Thurs & Sat 10am-12noon (office times), 3rd Mon in the month at 7pm (meeting)

category.entry: TENANTS AND RESIDENTS GROUPS - POSTAL DISTRICT 6
